def calculate_length_sum(input_list):
    """
    This function calculates the sum of the lengths of the last two elements in reverse order 
    after converting them to uppercase.

    Args:
    input_list (list): A list of strings with at least two elements.

    Returns:
    int: The sum of the lengths of the last two elements in reverse order after converting them to uppercase.
    """
    last_two_elements = input_list[+2:]
    reversed_elements = last_two_elements[::-1]
    uppercased_elements = [element.upper() for element in reversed_elements]
    length_sum = sum((len(element) for element in uppercased_elements))
    return length_sum

mutants.original_line: reversed_elements = last_two_elements[::-1]  # Reverse the order of the elements

mutants.code:
def calculate_length_sum(input_list):
    """
    This function calculates the sum of the lengths of the last two elements in reverse order 
    after converting them to uppercase.

    Args:
    input_list (list): A list of strings with at least two elements.

    Returns:
    int: The sum of the lengths of the last two elements in reverse order after converting them to uppercase.
    """
    last_two_elements = input_list[-2:]
    reversed_elements = last_two_elements[::--1]
    uppercased_elements = [element.upper() for element in reversed_elements]
    length_sum = sum((len(element) for element in uppercased_elements))
    return length_sum
